section.title: Overview
section.p: The present main-stream / regular-user correction paradigm is severely limited by arbitrary API decisions in the past. To change the technology foundation for providing more extensive services in the future, a new architecture for the whole linguistic processiong is suggested. Both overview notes and drafts for an API is presented here.
